name: InVideo
description: InVideo is an AI-powered video creation platform that simplifies professional-quality video production for users of all skill levels.
longDescription: InVideo is a cloud-based video editing platform designed to empower content creators, marketers, and businesses to produce engaging videos with ease. It offers two main products: InVideo AI, which leverages artificial intelligence to automate video creation from text prompts, and InVideo Studio, a template-driven editor with advanced customization options. The platform aims to eliminate the complexity of traditional video editing by providing intuitive tools, a vast media library, and AI-driven features. It serves a global audience, supporting video creation in over 75 languages for diverse use cases like social media, marketing, and education. By streamlining workflows and reducing production time, InVideo makes professional video content accessible to beginners and experts alike. Its mission is to democratize video creation, enabling anyone to craft compelling visual stories without technical expertise.
features: AI Video Generator creates full-length videos from text prompts, enabling quick content production without editing skills.
Over 6,000 customizable templates allow users to create branded videos tailored for social media, ads, or presentations.
A 9M+ premium media library, including iStock and Shutterstock, provides high-quality stock footage, images, and music.
Automated text-to-speech and voice cloning add professional narration to videos with customizable language and accent options.
Drag-and-drop editor simplifies video editing with intuitive controls and real-time preview for efficient workflows.
4K video export delivers crisp, high-resolution videos suitable for professional marketing and branding campaigns.
Real-time collaboration enables teams to edit and review videos together, enhancing productivity for agencies and businesses.
Brand kit integration ensures consistent logos, colors, and fonts across all video projects for cohesive branding.

faqs.question: What is InVideo used for?
faqs.answer: InVideo is used to create professional videos for social media, marketing, education, and branding with AI-driven tools and customizable templates.

faqs.question: Does InVideo offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, InVideo offers a free plan with limited features, including 10 minutes of AI generation per week and exports with a watermark.

faqs.question: Can beginners use InVideo?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, InVideo’s user-friendly interface and drag-and-drop editor make it accessible for users with no prior video editing experience.

faqs.question: What’s the difference between InVideo AI and InVideo Studio?
faqs.answer: InVideo AI automates video creation from text using AI, while InVideo Studio offers a timeline-based editor with templates for manual customization.

faqs.question: Can I remove the InVideo watermark?
faqs.answer: Watermarks can be removed by subscribing to a paid plan, such as the Plus or Max plan, which also unlock additional features.

faqs.question: Does InVideo support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, InVideo supports video creation in over 75 languages, making it ideal for global audiences and multilingual content.

faqs.question: Is InVideo suitable for team collaboration?
faqs.answer: InVideo offers real-time collaboration features on higher-tier plans, allowing teams to edit and provide feedback on shared projects.

faqs.question: What types of videos can I create with InVideo?
faqs.answer: You can create social media posts, ads, tutorials, promotional videos, and presentations using InVideo’s versatile tools and templates.
